input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is HPSEActor

1. Creates a new organization and adds top-level and sub-elements in the organization. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>create</command> <category>security</category> <process-id>create-organization</process-id> <command-arguments> <name>"Test Org 123456"</name> <description>Description123</description> <application-ids>1504 1505</application-ids> <host-ids>1504</host-ids> <storagesystem-ids>1504</storagesystem-ids> <tapelibrary-ids>1504</tapelibrary-ids> <switch-ids>1504</switch-ids> <childorganization-ids>1504</childorganization-ids> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. name[Required] Name of the organization description[Optional] Description of the organization application-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of applications to be added host-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of hosts to be added storagesystem-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of storagesystems to be added tapelibrary-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of tapelibrarys to be added switch-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of switchs to be added childorganization-ids[Optional] space-separated list of ids of childorganizations to be added
NOTE: Atleast one of the following components should be provided in the request:- application-ids, host-ids, storagesystem-ids, tapelibrary-ids, switch-ids and childorganization-ids.
However, "childorganization-ids" can not be provided alone while creating an organization. Atleast one of the following components should be provided in the request in this specific scenario:- application-ids, host-ids, storagesystem-ids, tapelibrary-ids, switch-ids.
NOTE: Any text which contains spaces should be enetered between double quotes

documentation.description:
This wrapper supports the following requirements:-
1. Creates a new organization and adds top-level and sub-elements in the organization.
